mapper.select: SELECT AC.ID, AC.NAME, AC.USERNAME, AC.PASSWORD, AC.PHONE, AC.WEIBO, AU.LEVEL AS a_level, AU.NAME AS a_name, DE.CODE AS d_code, DE.NAME AS d_name FROM ACCOUNT AC LEFT JOIN AUTH AU ON AC.AUTH_LEVEL = AU.LEVEL LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT DE ON AC.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DE.CODE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, WEIBO = #{weibo}, PASSWORD = #{password}, AUTH_LEVEL = #{auth.level}, DEPARTMENT_CODE = #{department.code} WHERE ID = #{id}
